content2.p: APD recognises its duty to provide a safe environment for all staff, contractors, visitors, trainees and others who may be affected by the activities at our working sites. As a Company we are committed to health and safety at work. We believe that the health and safety of all participants is of paramount importance whatever their position or function. See the Health and Safety at Work Act 1974, the Construction (Design and Management) Regulations (CDM 2007) and all other relevant legislation.
